PageTitle: reset ipv6 routing-table statistics protocol (User view)
FuncDef: The reset ipv6 routing-table statistics protocol command clears statistics in the IPv6 routing table.
CLIs: reset ipv6 routing-table all-vpn-instance statistics protocol { all | bgp | direct | isis | ospfv3 | ripng | static | unr }

ParaDef.Info:
Clears the statistics of all IPv6 routing protocols in the routing table.
-

Clears the statistics of bgp route.
-

Clears the statistics of direct route.
-

Clears the statistics of isis route.
-

Clears the statistics of ospfv3 route.
-

Clears the statistics of ripng route.
-

Clears the statistics of static route.
-

Clears the statistics of unr route.
-

Clears the statistics in the IPv6 routing tables of all VPN instances.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> reset ipv6 routing-table all-vpn-instance statistics protocol all
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The reset ipv6 routing-table statistics protocol command clears historical statistics about protocol routes in the IPv6 routing table. This command enables the router to re-collect statistics about protocol routes, facilitating route monitoring and fault location.
Precautions
Statistics in the IPv6 routing table cannot be restored after you clear them. Therefore, exercise caution when running the command.
